eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Park, CO; at 12:30 PM ON JAN 7, 2026 Effective until 02:30 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: From Park County 911. Deer Creek Campground fire west of Highland Park. Be prepared to evacuate, include pets and livestock. No current road closures. Info Line 719-836-4200.
